name: RHScroll
summary: With RHScroll you have a horizontal ScrollView with built in animations and notifications for tap and longPress gestures.
description: RHScroll  is a ScrollView similar to several famous apps out on the App Store. It creates in a simple way a horizontal ScrollView which can be used for several different purposes. YouÂ´re able to choose the size of the ScrollView, size of the items, the data and the positioning of everything. It has built in animations for tap and longPress.
